properties.description: To provide a warm, welcoming and free meeting place for anyone in Fishtoft to come along to meet others, make new friends, try their hand at the various crafts on offer whilst enjoying a cup of tea or coffee and cakes.
properties.title: Fishtoft400 Community Group

properties.address: Old Leake Community Centre, Furlongs Lane, Old Leake, Boston, PE22 9NX
properties.description: Warm Space and The Bread and Butter Thing available at the Old Leake Community Centre

hours._text: Starting 30th November 2022; Every Wednesday 10.00 am - 2.00 pm; Offer free tea, coffee, cold drinks, biscuits and light lunch; Board games, jigsaws, magazines, cards and bingo avaiable;  ; The Bread and Butter Thing: Working in partnership with supermarkets, factories and farms to redistribute surplus food.  A mobile food club is available at Old Leake Community Centre every Wednesday at 2 p.m.  Further details available below in the link to the website on how to book a slot.

properties.title: Old Leake Community - Warm Hub and The Bread and Butter Thing
